item.title: :gem: Algorithms
item.description: ðŸ—£ Overview scv supports simpson, jaccard, dice, cosine, pearson, euclidean, manhattan, and chebyshev algorithms. Those algorithms separated into two categories, similarities, and distances. The followings describes each algorithms and how to calculate similarity/distance from two vectors. Before calculating the similarities and/or distance of the following algorithms, we assume that two vectors were given (\(v = \{ (a_1, b_1), (a_2, b_2), ..., (a_n, b_n) \}\) and \(w = \{ (c_1, d_1), (c_2, d_2), .
